overview: Updated for Phase 2 post-MVP. Focus: Detail views, data enrichment, member dir. Reference new /data JSONs. Update scores dynamically.

tasks.name: Transparency Breakdown Detail View
tasks.description: Drill-down pages for Meter categories. Show sub-points, evidence, gaps.

subtasks.action: Create /src/components/TransparencyDetail.tsx: Mini-pie chart (Recharts), evidence table (Category Sub-Item | Status | Source | Notes).
Add routing: /pages/transparency/[category].tsx. Fetch category data from Supabase; render gaps as red badges.
Integrate CTA: Link to submission form. Update Meter bars to be clickable (use Next Link).
Test: Add RTL tests for drill-down render.

tasks.output: Detail views live; e.g., /transparency/people shows roles/gaps.

tasks.name: Verification Workflow Tags
tasks.description: Add 'Verified by Community' badges; admin moderation placeholder.

subtasks.action: Update DB schema: Add 'verifiedBy' field to tables.

tasks.name: Member Directory + Paid Positions
tasks.description: Searchable list from new data; flag pay gaps.

subtasks.action: Seed new people/committees from /data/network-nodes.json to Supabase.
/pages/members.tsx: Table with search/filter; red badge for 'Salary: Missing'.

tasks.name: Historical Budget Comparison
tasks.description: Add 2025 vs. 2026 tab in Budget page; pull from reports.

subtasks.action: Fetch 2026 data (e.g., from Intersect updates); add to DB.

tasks.name: Member Directory v2 — Structure & Power
tasks.description: Searchable table: Name | Role | Affil | Responsibilities | Paid? | Power Level | Source. Sort by influence; founder overlaps red-flagged.

subtasks.action: Update /data/people.json schema: add paid, decision_power, responsibilities fields (done in data).
Update /pages/members.tsx: Add columns for Paid, Decision Power, Responsibilities. Red badge for 'Salary: Missing'. Sort by decision_power desc.
Add filter controls: 'Show Paid Only', affiliation filter, power level filter.

tasks.output: Member directory with full structure, power levels, and pay transparency flags.

tasks.name: Committee Breakdowns — Sub-pages/Modals
tasks.description: Detailed committee views from table/graph. Org chart: managers → secretaries → members with responsibility bubbles.

subtasks.action: Create /pages/committees/[slug].tsx: Show members, roles, paid status, decision_power, gaps per committee.
Add org-chart viz (react-organizational-chart or custom): Board → Committees → WGs hierarchy.
Link committee cards from Transparency Detail and main table to sub-pages.

tasks.output: Navigable committee breakdowns with org chart visualization.

tasks.name: Power Map Enhancement — Influence Graph v2
tasks.description: Add 'reports_to' edges (committees→board), node sizes by decision_power. Tooltips: 'Gap: No salary—submit evidence?'

subtasks.action: Enrich network-nodes.json: Add 'reports_to' link type, 'decision_power' field per node.
Update InfluenceGraph.tsx: Scale node size by decision_power. Color-code by type (board=red, staff=blue, member=gray).
Add interactive tooltips with gap prompts: 'No salary disclosed—submit evidence?' linking to form.

tasks.output: Influence graph with power-weighted nodes and gap-aware tooltips.

tasks.name: Gaps Dashboard — Transparency Debt Meter
tasks.description: Dynamic gap list with 'Transparency Debt' progress meter. Community can upvote gaps for priority. Integrated with submission form.

subtasks.action: Create /components/GapsDashboard.tsx: Render gaps from input.json with severity badges and upvote counts.
Add Transparency Debt meter (progress bar): total gaps vs resolved. Hook to Supabase for persistence.
Wire upvote to Supabase; sort by votes. Link 'Submit Evidence' to community form per gap.

tasks.name: Filters & Dynamic Score Recalculation
tasks.description: Add UI filters (e.g., Show Paid Only). Recalculate transparency scores dynamically based on verified data points post-seed.

subtasks.action: Add filter UI to Member Directory, Transparency Table: paid status, affiliation, power level.
Implement score recalculation engine: count verified/partial/missing per category, recompute weighted score.
Update TransparencyMeter to use dynamic scores from recalculation instead of fallback constants.

tasks.output: Scores update automatically as data is verified; filters enable focused exploration.

subtasks.action: Import /data/network-nodes.json to Supabase (people/relationships tables).
Recalculate scores: e.g., People=50% with new verified roles.
Update Influence Graph: Add new nodes/edges; tooltips with sources.

global_notes: Prioritize facts: Use sources in tooltips/tables.
Monitor: Add Vercel Analytics for success metrics.
